line_1: And thunder SHUTER'S praises — he's so droll.
line_2: FROM galleries loud peals of laughter roll,

line_1: Yet here thou art a cherished droll,
line_2: Known by the name of Pretty Poll;

line_1: Why how now, Andrew! cries his Brother Droll,
line_2: To-Day's Conceit, methinks, is something dull:

line_1: O dearest Andrew, says the humble Droll,
line_2: Henceforth may I Obey, and Thou Controll:
